codeSystems.name: Country_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Country EMA
codeSystems.description: Country codes by EMA. Based on ISO 3166-1-2, recoded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: Domain_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Domain EMA
codeSystems.description: Domain of the medicinal product (human, veterinary, both)

codeSystems.name: LegalStatusForTheSupply_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Legal Status for the Supply EMA
codeSystems.description: Legal status of supply. EMA SPOR RMS list.

codeSystems.name: Marketing_Status_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Marketing Status EMA
codeSystems.description: Marketing status of the product in given country. EMA SPOR RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: Language_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Language EMA
codeSystems.description: Language codes by EMA. Based on BCP-47, recoded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: Routes_And_Methods_Of_Administration_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Routes and Methods of Administration EMA
codeSystems.description: Routes and methods of medication administration. Based on EDQM, re-coded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: Packaging_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Packaging EMA SPOR
codeSystems.description: Package types, including closures and administration devices. Based on EDQM, recoded with EMA SPOR RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: ATC_Human_EMA
codeSystems.title: ATC Human EMA
codeSystems.description: ATC classification recoded with EMA SPOR RMS codes. Flat list, WHO ATC codes provided in description field for easier use.

codeSystems.name: UnitOfMeasurement_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Unit of Measurement EMA
codeSystems.description: Unit of Measurement. Based on UCUM. Re-coded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: PharmaceuticalDoseForm_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Pharmaceutical Dose Form EMA
codeSystems.description: Pharmaceutical dose form. Based on EDQM, re-coded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: CombinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Combined Pharmaceutical Dose Form EMA
codeSystems.description: Combined Pharmaceutical Dose Form. Based on EDQM. Re-coded with RMS codes. Used only for authorised dose form.

codeSystems.name: CombinedTerm_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Combined Term EMA
codeSystems.description: Combined Term. Based on EDQM. Re-coded with RMS codes. Only used for authorised dose form.

codeSystems.name: CombinationPackage_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Combination Package EMA
codeSystems.description: Dose forms for combination packages. Based on EDQM. Re-coded with RMS codes. Only used for authorised dose form.

codeSystems.name: UnitOfPresentation_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Unit of Presentation EMA
codeSystems.description: Unit of presentation list from EMA SPOR. List id 200000000014. Content based on EDQM, re-coded with RMS codes.

codeSystems.name: Material_EMA_CS
codeSystems.title: Material EMA
codeSystems.description: Package material. EMA SPOR RMS list. Hierarchical.

codeSystems.name: Substance_SMS_CS
codeSystems.title: Substances EMA SPOR SMS
codeSystems.description: UNICOM PPL substances from EMA SPOR SMS
